column5: I know its a canadian board but warmer weather is here in southern ohio and i will try to catch a few eyes this friday. Trying to make some of you jealous that still have hard water and cold temps. Only 2 months and 4 days until I leave for the first of 4 week long canadian trips. Can't wait for that. Eric
We have soft water year round and open seasons year round in Southern Ontario...sorry...didn't mean to make you jealous :D
